ygData.subject: twinking
ygData.msgSnippet: Twiinking is just part of the game....... It s a fact and to be honest the only people that have problem s with it are people that are jelous. I have to ask if
ygData.messageBody:
Twiinking is just part of the game....... It's a fact and to be honest the
only people that have problem's with it are people that are jelous.

I have to ask if you have taken the time to get to level 50 and that person
start's a new char. If he, or she desides to twink his new char for the fun
of it what's wrong with that. I think to be honest I beleave it's that
player's right and verrant wont do nothing about it!!!
Why not. Because there is nothing truly being done wrong.

Hell If the char you love playing now could get a robe that was from the
plain of fear I am sure for a fact that you who are complaning would for a
fact take that robe and waer it with pride for the fact that other's in your
team couldnt get it for a long time.

If you are going to gripe about any thing them pick something that is going
to improve the game. Like time for new spells... or new dungon's.... or
vamping zone's that are empty so that there is more hunting grounds. Thing's
like that are valid.

This game is made for people to have fun. If a person way of fun is playing
a level 3 char with ruby armor... I say all the power to him.... emjoy
fighting your fire bettel is what I say.
